mapper.select: select a.user_no,user_id,user_name,gender,age ,tr_info_no , tr_career , tr_profile , tr_descript , tr_certi from member a JOIN trainerinfo b on (a.user_no = b.user_no) where status = 'Y' and user_level = 1

select a.user_no,user_id,user_name,gender,age ,tr_info_no , tr_career , tr_profile , tr_descript , tr_certi from member a JOIN trainerinfo b on (a.user_no = b.user_no) where status = 'Y' and user_level = 1
